trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for custom activities that implement execution logic using the <see cref="M:System.Activities.NativeActivity.Execute(System.Activities.ActivityExecutionContext)" /> method, which has full access to the runtime’s features.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Activities.NativeActivity.Execute(System.Activities.ActivityExecutionContext)" /> 方法實作執行邏輯之自訂活動的抽象基底類別，可完整存取執行階段的功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a class that inherits from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立繼承自 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Custom Composite using Native Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[自訂複合使用原生活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，建立衍生類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a class that inherits from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立繼承自 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Custom Composite using Native Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[自訂複合使用原生活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: The execution context in which the activity executes.
trans-unit.target: 活動執行的執行內容。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, takes actions in response to the activity being aborted.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會採取動作以回應中止的活動。

trans-unit.source: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 建立並驗證活動之引數、變數、子活動和活動委派的描述。

trans-unit.source: Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 自訂活動作者可以在活動的 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> 覆寫中提供驗證邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 從 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 這些例外狀況會從 <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="M:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata(System.Activities.NativeActivityMetadata)" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用 <see cref="M:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata(System.Activities.NativeActivityMetadata)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 自訂活動作者可以在活動的 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> 覆寫中提供驗證邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 從 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 這些例外狀況會從 <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。

trans-unit.source: The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 封裝活動之引數、變數、子活動和活動委派的活動中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 建立並驗證活動之引數、變數、子活動和活動委派的描述。

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage run-time relationships and lifetime rules.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段會使用 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> 的預設實作，以確保工作流程的正確結構以及管理執行階段關聯性和存留期規則。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> examines the public members of the activity type using the type’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> 的預設實作會使用型別的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> 檢查活動型別的公用成員。

trans-unit.source: These public members are of type <xref:System.Activities.Argument>, <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, [IEnumerable\<Variable>](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), <xref:System.Activities.Activity>, [IEnumerable\<Activity>](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), or <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: 這些公用成員是型別<xref:System.Activities.Argument>， <xref:System.Activities.Variable>， [IEnumerable\<變數 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)， <xref:System.Activities.Activity>， [IEnumerable\<活動 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)，或<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to customize the building of the activity’s run-time description and to provide custom validation logic.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個方法，以自訂活動之執行階段描述的建置，並提供自訂驗證邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 從 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 這些例外狀況會從 <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates using CacheMetadata in a class that inherits from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在繼承自 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601> 的類別中使用 CacheMetadata。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Custom Composite using Native Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[自訂複合使用原生活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: The execution context in which the activity executes.
trans-unit.target: 活動執行的執行內容。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, runs logic to cause graceful early completion of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，執行邏輯以便在非失誤性的狀況下及早完成活動。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates using Cancel in a class that inherits from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在繼承自 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601> 的類別中使用 Cancel。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Non-Generic ParallelForEach](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/non-generic-parallelforeach.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[非泛型 ParallelForEach](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/non-generic-parallelforeach.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the activity can cause the workflow to become idle.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出此活動是否會造成工作流程變為閒置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the activity can cause the workflow to become idle.
trans-unit.target: 如果活動會導致工作流程變為閒置，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This value is <see langword="false" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: 這個值預設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The execution context in which the activity executes.
trans-unit.target: 活動執行的執行內容。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, runs the activity’s execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，執行活動的執行邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates using Cancel in a class that inherits from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在繼承自 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601> 的類別中使用 Cancel。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Non-Generic ParallelForEach](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/non-generic-parallelforeach.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[非泛型 ParallelForEach](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/non-generic-parallelforeach.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: The execution logic of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的執行邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 執行邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the implementation version of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定活動的實作版本。

trans-unit.source: The implementation version of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的實作版本。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when creating a map for the dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: 建立動態更新的對應時引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The metadata.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The original activity.
trans-unit.target: 原始活動。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when creating a map for the dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: 建立動態更新的對應時引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The metadata.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The original activity.
trans-unit.target: 原始活動。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when creating a map for the dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: 建立動態更新的對應時引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The update context.
trans-unit.target: 更新內容。

trans-unit.source: Updates the instance of <see cref="T:System.Activities.NativeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 更新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.NativeActivity" /> 的執行個體。
